**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**Deskew Version**
Needed to have any chance to fix the bug, please report:
- CLI version 
- GUI version (if used)
- Platform, OS, CPU (which deskew binary used) 
- Compiler (if you build deskew yourself)
